The course really motivates me to study further about marketing field. The lecture contents are interesting and useful. The final project activity is absolutely great!! Thank you, Steven!!!

The lecture is really fun and useful. Professor Park gave us a lot of space to think and discuss, which really helps me in learning. In addition, professor Park is a really nice teacher. He is always willing to help every student.
老師人超級好，上課方式也很有趣！而且上課也非常有內容，也鼓勵學生回答和提問，是一位非常好的教授！
大推！雖然是英文授課但不會太難，有可以學習到外國人的思考模式，也能培養自己獨立思考的能力（因為老師會一直點人回答問題），如果考試和報告進行的方式能再明確和提早說明的話會更好！
The best and the most hardworking teacher I’ve met.

This teacher needs to adapt his teaching documents to more objective ones, also he made us pay for some documents, what I find a bad idea. During the first couples of month he asked us for too much homework

I think the group presentation takes too much time, and some of them presented as not well-prepared😅It will be better if we could have a pre-discussion with prof. before presenting, which will deepen the content and be more inspiring.

I really love professor attitude and energy, I like that you assign every week reading assignment,but I think the content of the class is too basic and Guest Speaker should be more expert and share depth information. Fighting!
星俊超可愛的～上他的課輕鬆但能學到很多！

As a fundamental course of marketing, Professor Park has successfully organized the pace of the lecture, which made the course not stressful, while students can still get a glance of the world of marketing. 
推薦給想認識行銷的朋友！順便練習英文聽力與口說與認識外籍朋友！
